price: "Wanda ya ji tsõron Mai rahama a fake, *kuma ya zo da wata irin zũciya mai tawakkali."
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ
footnotes: * Tsoron Allah a fake, shĩ ne a bauta masa, bã da riya ba, ɓayyane da ɓõye duka ɗaya.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
